title: It would be great to see more Cinematic video again
body: I always wanted to see one with Renekton and Nasus fighting

replies.body: {{champion:119}} vs {{champion:119}}
SPOILER {{champion:119}}  wins
Actually none wins, because they'll just catch each other axe continuously
Eventually one of them would lag.
It would either end with both dravens killing each other over which one looks better, or with both dravens just complimenting each other for the rest of time
I want zed and yasuo in the next cinematic, pretty much anyone who would have a badass fighting sequence

{{champion:17}}  can make it worse ;)
Velkoz has 4 eyes, actually. One big one and 3 little ones near the top pf his head/body thing.
{{champion:64}}
The Void and the Shadow Isles have been very underrepresented in the cinematics.

To be fair, those are also the hardest champions to animate. Humans are easy- the further from human you get the harder it is to rig and model properly. But I agree, I'd love to see Morde have more impact on a cinematic than just getting oneshot by Teemo.

Come to think of it, Yordles are also not highly represented in the cinematics. There's so much unused content that would look great though, so I hope they decide to devote the time to actually use it.
pls no more kat {{champion:55}} or Ryze {{champion:13}}
Their cinematics lack soul though.
{{champion:44}} ~~vs~~ x {{champion:81}}
It would be a cinematic, alright. Just not child appropiate. ;D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PEJABY5kcNs

Watch this  then for a sexy Renekton and nasus battle
{{champion:121}} VS {{champion:107}}
Yes, it would be nice to see a new one.
They have been releasing a lot more Cinematic teasers with champion releases and the project skins also had 2 or 3 little animations so it might take them longer to do another big one.
I would say the Project video is just animation not Cinematic tho

As an animation major- they most likely DO need an entire year to make those things- they're fantastic but I just consider the time involved and I get a little older just thinking about it. Animation is not a fast craft.

The one with Nautilus in particular was **stunning** to watch. I'm sure they're working on another one- and I'm equally sure everyone wishes their favorite champion could appear in it.
I dont think they're coming back. They're one of the first things to go in the scramble for corner-cutting to report artificial profit increases once the optimal phase of profit has been surpassed.

I want  

{{champion:22}} vs {{champion:110}}
i want one where fiora dies
i always thought it was a huge shame that {{champion:82}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:30}}  never got a pentakill music video.
I WANT FULL ON CINEMATIC WARS my dream
I would like to see Sivir or Syndra in one.
If it's as good or better than A Twist of Fate, then yeah. If it's like that last one, I'll pass.
The community vs Riot

I would love to see another Cinimatic also there fun to watch and get me excited to play..

That being said I would rather they focus on current issues like balance and updates currently with the way Season 6 is going.. No I am not QQing about champs being op ect. But the strive for a near perfect game with balanced champs is a never ending process that needs more attention.
I think that duel would be more like Renekton fighting and Nasus farming.
We'll probably get another one soon-ish.  Hopefully it'll be with a Mount Targon lore event.

I would like to see a cinematic which involves **my precious Akali** or **my awesome Syndra**.
I just have the fan-made Akali vs Master Yi video on Youtube :C.
